text: Sérgio Manuel Freitas Pedro (born 17 June 1969) is a retired Angolan-born, Portuguese football midfielder. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Vitória F.C. players Category:Rio Ave F.C. players Category:C.D.
